report.name: lstcontc

dataSource.name: Q_ligne
dataSource.select:
select C.CDATSAI, C.SOCCONT , S.SOCLIB , C.NUMCONT, DECODE(c.top30,'O',DECODE(c.cav,'000',NULL,RPAD(c.cav,3)),'N',SUBSTR(c.cav,2,2) ) CAV, C.COBJET1, C.COBJET2,C.CCOUTHT,C.CODSG, C.CDATDEB, C.CDATFIN, C.COMCODE, C.CDATRPOL, C.CDATDIR, C.CTYPFACT, L.IDENT, R.RNOM, R.RPRENOM, pack_situation_p.verif_situ_ligcont_rep(l.ident,l.soccont,l.lresdeb,l.lresfin) LCPREST,--L.LCPREST, L.LCCOUACT, SR.DATSITU, SR.DATDEP,md.code_contractuel,md.LIBELLE, l.lresdeb, l.lresfin from SITU_RESS SR, RESSOURCE R, LIGNE_CONT L, CONTRAT C, SOCIETE S , MODE_CONTRACTUEL md where C.SOCCONT = S.SOCCODE and C.SOCCONT = L.SOCCONT and C.NUMCONT = L.NUMCONT and C.CAV = L.CAV and L.IDENT = R.IDENT and R.IDENT = SR.IDENT and l.mode_contractuel = md.code_contractuel(+) -- derniere situation de ressource and (sr.ident, sr.datsitu) = (SELECT SR2.ident, MAX(SR2.datsitu) FROM situ_ress SR2 WHERE SR2.ident = (r.ident) GROUP BY SR2.ident ) &P_WHERE
order by c.soccont, c.numcont, c.cav, l.ident
-- and C.FILCODE = :P_PARAM6 -- and C.SOCCONT = :P_PARAM7 -- and C.CODSG = :P_PARAM8 -- and L.ident = :P_PARAM9 -- and C.ctypfact = :P_PARAM10 -- and c.cdatdeb <= TO_DATE(:P_PARAM11, 'dd/mm/yyyy') -- and C.cdatfin >= TO_DATE(:P_PARAM12, 'dd/mm/yyyy') -- and C.CCOUTHT >= :P_PARAM13

dataDescriptor.expression: DECODE ( c.top30 , 'O' , DECODE ( c.cav , '000' , NULL , RPAD ( c.cav , 3 ) ) , 'N' , SUBSTR ( c.cav , 2 , 2 ) )

function.name: afterpform
rtrimetoile
f_filiale1formattrigger
f_cfrais1formattrigger
